pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, July 16, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers.

Closed to media.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.

2:30 p.m.  The Prime Minister, accompanied by Deputy Prime Minister Chrystia Freeland, will deliver remarks and hold a media availability.

Room 225
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#
